thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 20 of 46
thread.title: Connie

author: Connie
title: Connie
text:
I researched a replacement espresso maker to death. There are a couple great companies out there that do a wonderful job educating one on different machines. After almost purchasing a couple machines I landed on WholeLatteLove and the Gaggia Brera and bought.
Love this machine. Great features and usability for the price. (replace a nicer Breville)
The on-line how-to videos WholeLatteLove produces are priceless. From operating to descaling. Great step by step and tips. If I have a question, I just pull up a video. They even include text instructions, which as so appreciated when descaling the first time.
